org.sonatype.restsimple.api
Class TypedAction<T,V>

java.lang.Object
  org.sonatype.restsimple.api.TypedAction<T,V>
Type Parameters:
T -
V -
All Implemented Interfaces:
Action<T,V>
Direct Known Subclasses:
AddressBookAction, PetstoreAction
public class TypedAction<T,V>
extends Object
implements Action<T,V>

Simple Action that delegate the HTTP method operation to proper method implementation of GET, POST, PUT and DELETE. By default all method are throwing an exception with the status code set to 405 (NOT SUPPORTED). Override the proper method. 

 public class PetstoreAction extends TypedAction {

    @Override
    public Pet get(ActionContext actionContext) {
        String pathValue = actionContext.pathParams().get("pet");
        Map> headers = actionContext.headers();

        Pet pet = pets.get(pathValue);
        return pet;
    }

    @Override
    public Pet post(ActionContext actionContext) {
        Map> headers = actionContext.headers();
        Map> queryStrings = actionContext.paramsString();
        Map> matrixParams = actionContext.matrixString();

        String pathValue = actionContext.pathParams().get("pet");

        Pet pet = actionContext.get();
        pets.put(pathValue, pet);
        return pet;
    }

    @Override
    public Pet delete(ActionContext actionContext) {
        String pathValue = actionContext.pathParams().get("pet");

        return pets.remove(pathValue);
    }
 }
